summary: A simple mod to improve the Gauldur Amulet\'s stats from vanilla game, without making it overpowered, but rewarding for the quest to obtain it.
descriptionHtml:
A simple mod to improve the Gauldur Amulet. Let\'s face it, for all the trouble you went through to get this reward, the amulet will be way too weak by the time you get it where you\'ll most likely already have necklaces with better enchantments. 

The original amulet gives +30 to Health, Stamina, and Magicka. This changes the enchantment to +50 Health/Magicka/Stamina and +10% Health/Stamina/Magicka Regeneration

[b]=== INSTALLATION ===[/b]
Use any mod manager like NMM or just manually drop them in Skyrim\'s Data folder. If you manual installed, don\'t forget to tick/activate the esp before starting the game.

[b]=== UNINSTALLATION ===[/b]
Remove or delete TrueGauldurAmulet.esp

[b]=== LOAD ORDER ===[/b]
Anywhere will work

[b]=== COMPATIBILITY ===[/b]
Not compatible with anything that changes the Gauldur Amulet
author: Nofumasa
